text: 13.12: Mt 25.29; Mk 4.25; Ru 8.18; 19.26Khueŋ guigira, guma Fhe Bakɨme wo gumgi gu mbigi ganɨrim, mbe ana piin kɨrga tɨva kaŋgi, Fhe Bakɨme wo gumgi gu mbigi ganɨnga bigi vhɨrve phorgɨp ana khɨvarga, ana guigira kaŋgirga. Guma ana Fhe Bakɨme won gumgi gu mbigi ganɨnga, mbe ana piin kɨrga tɨva kaŋgi fhu, ana mba kaŋgi ndɨkndɨga bisaneŋ, ana ana tɨn ne ndigirga.
